offset-distance.name: offset-distance
offset-distance.percentages: refer to the total path length
offset-distance.computedValue: For <length> the absolute value, otherwise a percentage.

offset-position.name: offset-position
offset-position.percentages: Refer to the size of containing block
offset-position.computedValue: For <length> the absolute value, otherwise a percentage.

offset-anchor.name: offset-anchor
offset-anchor.percentages: Relative to the width and the height of a box
offset-anchor.computedValue: For <length> the absolute value, otherwise a percentage.

offset-rotate.name: offset-rotate
offset-rotate.computedValue: computed <angle> value, optionally preceded by auto

<size>.prose: Decides the path length used when offset-distance is expressed as a percentage, using the distance to the containing box. For <size> values other than sides, the path length is independent of <angle>. It is defined as: <size> = [ closest-side | closest-corner | farthest-side | farthest-corner | sides ]
